name: StringUtil_isAsciiTest
description: Unit tests for the isAscii method in the StringUtil class.

test_cases.name: testIsAscii_AllAsciiCharacters
test_cases.description: Tests that the isAscii method returns true for a string containing all ASCII characters.

test_cases.name: testIsAscii_NonAsciiCharacter
test_cases.description: Tests that the isAscii method returns false for a string containing a non-ASCII character.

test_cases.name: testIsAscii_EmptyString
test_cases.description: Tests that the isAscii method returns true for an empty string.

test_cases.name: testIsAscii_NullString
test_cases.description: Tests that the isAscii method throws an IllegalArgumentException for a null string.
